docs.summary: API for the site's txt files (robots.txt and ads.txt)

params.name: adsTxt
params.doc:
Provided content will be appended to existing content.
Use `default:true` to reset the content to default, no `content` is required in that case

docs.summary:
Append content to the Ads.txt file content.
 
 In order to reset the content to Wix's default, send `default: true`.

examples.title: Append Ads.txt Example
body:
curl PATCH https://www.wixapis.com/promote-seo-txt-file-server/v2/ads \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -d '{"adsTxt": {"content": "google.com, pub-0000000000000001, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0", "subdomain": "www"}}'

params.name: subdomain
params.doc: The subdomain of the requested Ads.txt file ,e.g. www, es, fr. default is www.

ret.doc: The response of the Ads.txt file request

docs.summary:
Get the Ads.txt file content.
 Returns the content and whether it's the default.

params.name: subdomain
params.doc: The subdomain of the requested robots.txt file ,e.g. www, es, fr. default is www.

ret.doc: The response of the Robots.txt file request

docs.summary:
Get the Robots.txt file content.
 Returns the content and whether it's the default.

examples.title: Get Robots.txt Example
response:
{"robotsTxt": {
  "content": "User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Optimization for Google Ads Bot
User-Agent: AdsBot-Google-Mobile
User-Agent: AdsBot-Google
Disallow: /_api/*
Disallow: /_partials*
Disallow: /pro-gallery-webapp/v1/galleries/*",
  "default": true,
  "subdomain": "www"
}}

params.name: adsTxt
params.doc:
Provided content will override existing content.
Use `default:true` to reset the content to default, no `content` is required in that case

docs.summary:
Update the Ads.txt file content.

 You may set an empty string as the file content.

 In order to reset the content to Wix's default, send `default: true`.

examples.title: Update Ads.txt Example
body:
curl PUT https://www.wixapis.com/promote-seo-txt-file-server/v2/ads \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -d '{"adsTxt": {"content": "google.com, pub-0000000000000000, DIRECT, f08c47fec0942fa0", "subdomain": "www"}}'

extra.description: You can pass `default: true` in case you need to reset to default

params.name: robotsTxt
params.doc:
Provided content will override existing content.
Use `default:true` to reset the content to default, no `content` is required in that case

docs.summary:
Update the Robots.txt file content.
 You may set an empty string as the file content.
 In order to reset the content to Wix's default, send `default: true`.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_promote_seo_robots_server_v2_AdsTxtUpdatedDomainEvent

members.name: entityId
members.doc: AdsTxt ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).
